name: The Nightshift at Baldi's Schoolhouse
description:
Release Date: November 25th, 2021 (subject to change, if not finished by then)

GJ DEMO RELEASE DATE: November 11th 2021 (FNAF2's 7th BDAY/Veterans Day)

Itch.io DEMO RELEASE: November 14th, 2021

-STORY-

Welcome to Here School, a closed establishment that shut down in 1999 due to killings of the staff, as well as others. 3 years later, your in the shoes of Greg Rushmore, a worker for the Paranormal Invesigation Association team, whose latest task is for you to spend the week at Baldi’s Schoolhouse, investigating/seeing if any ghosts haunt the place. And at the same time, getting 1 notebook per night after completing a night.

You would’ve expected this job as a night watchman/investigator to be boring. But, there’s more to it than meets the eye.

Is this a remake of Five Nights at Baldis by

@Jirawatgaming (who has a Gamejolt account)?

Yes.

This is a remake of a little 2018 cancelled FNAF x BALDI'S BASICS crossover game I made. And this game is part remake of @Jirawatgaming's Five Nights at Baldi's game and part original FNAF game.

And I am remaking it since I want to put my own spin on it.
